// frontend/src/components/FilterBar.jsx import React from 'react'; export default function FilterBar({ q, setQ, scope, setScope, // 'unverified' | 'verified' | 'all' sort, setSort, // 'createdAt' | 'year' | 'studentName' | 'diplomaNumber' dir, setDir, // 'asc' | 'desc' faculty, setFaculty, specialty, setSpecialty, faculties = [], specialties = [], showScope = true, onRefresh }) { return (
setQ(e.target.value)} placeholder="Пошук ПІБ / № диплому / спец." className="border p-2 rounded" /> {showScope && ( )}
); }
